Our Menu

Jim ’N Nick’s is Open for Dine In, To Go, Drive Thru & Catering

Prices and menu items may vary by location
Visiting our Niceville, FL location? Download Niceville Menu 
SALADS, POTATOES & SOUPS

Ranch • Bar-B-Q Ranch • Vinaigrette • Honey Mustard • Blue Cheese
Dressings 
Bar-B-Q Salad**

Bacon, cheddar cheese, cucumbers, tomatoes, almonds and homemade croutons, topped with smoked pulled pork or chickenOption: Substitute beef brisket

Chopped Southern Salad**

Smoked chicken, smoked onions and sweet corn, cheddar cheese, bacon, cucumber, tomatoes, almonds and homemade croutons, tossed in house-made vinaigrette

Not-So-Naked Potato (GF)

A large baked potato topped with bacon, cheddar cheese, butter, sour cream and scallions

Loaded Bar-B-Q Baker (GF)

A huge baked potato topped with your choice of smoked meat, bacon, cheddar cheese, scallions, butter, sour cream and barbecue sauce

Our Famous Brisket Chili (GF)

Homemade chili made with our smoked brisket •
Cup Bowl

At Jim 'N Nick's, we're about people

Want to join the JNN Team in North Charleston?

We're always looking for great talent to join the JNN team. Browse available positions from Servers and Kitchen Staff to Hosts and Managers. We're excited to hear from you.
Browse Jobs 
What does community mean to us? Everything.

Hey, we love barbecue. We love preparing it, we love serving it, and we really love eating it. But most of all, we love the way it brings people together.
Our Community
